title: Mediterranean Fish Cakes
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '150g (6 oz) fresh scallops', '1/2 medium onion', '4 cloves garlic', '5 sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '1 egg', '1 bunch fresh parsley', '6 basil leaves', '2 fresh green chillies, seeded', '1 tablespoon Italian herb seasoning', '50g dried breadcrumbs', '1 (250g) tin tuna, drained', '1 (200g) tin prawns, drained', '4 tablespoons plain flour']
